description: Design and implement integration solutions between SAP and non-SAP systems using SAP Cloud Platform Integration (CPI) and Process Integration (PI).
Develop custom SAP applications and enhancements using ABAP programming language.
Build modern web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js stack.
Develop backend services and data processing applications using Python.
Design and maintain data pipelines for large-scale data processing.
Implement and manage continuous integration and deployment pipelines.
Advise clients on ERP system selection, implementation, and optimization.
Design scalable and secure cloud architectures for enterprise applications.
